outputs.output_descr:
Project Objectives:
	Assist in disseminating accurate information on competitiveness indexes on the Syrian Industrial Sector and the relevant economic sectors.
	Assist in benchmarking the Competitiveness indexes of the Syrian Economy with selective group of countries.
	Provide strategic technical advice on first-best practices. 
	Create a sense of urgency among stakeholders to drive competitiveness to the forefront of the national agenda.
	Help motivate a more competitive economy.   
	Assist the Syrian government in producing the first National Competitiveness Report.


Component 2: Establish and build the capacities of the National Observatory Unite. Unit's mission: Establish the first data base that will enable measuring a bunch of the Syrian Economic competitiveness indicators & indexes according to international methodological standards, benchmark them with matching indicators & indexes of various countries in the world, and rank the Syrian economic competitiveness status visa-a-vi other economies in the world.        
This calls the project to establish cooperation criteria and concept for future partnerships with international institutions specialized in competitiveness measurement at the regional and international levels.  
Location: The project was temporarily hosted at the Decision Support Unit- Baramkeh during the period August 1 - Nov. 15, 2005, and after words

Project Objectives:
	Assist in disseminating accurate information on competitiveness indexes on the Syrian Industrial Sector and the relevant economic sectors.
	Assist in benchmarking the Competitiveness indexes of the Syrian Economy with selective group of countries.
	Provide strategic technical advice on first-best practices. 
	Create a sense of urgency among stakeholders to drive competitiveness to the forefront of the national agenda.
	Help motivate a more competitive economy.   
	Assist the Syrian government in producing the first National Competitiveness Report.

Project Component 1: Establish and build the capacities of the National Competitiveness Unit. Unit's mission: Study and analyze the degree of competitiveness of the Syrian Industrial Sector at the micro level, through the completion of field survey & scientific analysis of selective industrial sub-sectors; based on value chain analysis. Recommend policies to increase value added at different segments within the production chain.
